title: Glassmakers
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - Great Britain
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Stained glass industry
Crafts & Visual Arts/Glass painting and staining
description: Episode of Series "This Is Britain". A survey of the wide range of glass products manufactured by British craftsmen. Includes manufacture of plate glass and installation of a large sheet in one of the Festival of Britain buildings; making of stained glass windows; manufacture of optical glass and lenses; prisms and lanterns for lighthouses; production of electric light globes; glass blowing and making of nahd0made cut glass.
related_objects: Series; S00852; This Is Britain; Active
